title: Nise x Koi Boyfriend
original_name: 偽 × 恋ボーイフレンド
sinopse:
Volume 1
1-2. Nise x Koi Boyfriend 3. Yowamushi Kareshi to Rokudenashi (A Cowardly Boyfriend and a Good-for-Nothing) 4. Kimi to Boku de Chouchou Musubi wo (A Ribbon Made of You and Me) 5. Usotsuki to Happy End wo (A Happy End with a Liar)

Volume 2
1-5. Nise x Koi Boyfriend Lovely 6. Yowamushi Kareshi to Kuroi Neko
